author: bbuddha.xyz
content: cant seem to find the hashToCurve method being used for BLS signatures on beacon chain. can anyone point me in the right direction?

author: potuz
content: <https://github.com/supranational/blst/blob/master/bindings/go/blst.go#L1781> Take a look at the functions starting there, also look for other bindings to your favourite language
